title: Bone
description:
A bone which may be used for a dog to chew on, or as a part of the human body. The type of bone is not specified.

May be used to represent the NSFW term "to bone".
apple_vendor_description: The bone emoji on Apple devices is rendered with a clean, white, and slightly curved form, showcasing Apple's signature realistic lighting that gives it a smooth, almost polished appearance. Its simple, rounded edges and subtle shading create a tactile feel, evoking concepts of health, nourishment, or even a playful 'digging in' to a topic. This emoji is often used humorously or in discussions related to pets, health, or satisfying a craving within Apple's intuitive interface.
